definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
to look favorably on sth/would be glad to see it happen

sentences.english: He always optimistic and genially treats the others.
sentences.chinese: 他總是樂觀的，並且和善地對待別人。

sentences.english: The first law is very upbeat.
Optimistic locking, where a record is locked only when changes are committed to the database.
sentences.chinese: 樂觀的鎖定，只當數據庫發生更改時鎖定記錄。

sentences.english: Learned before, a table personnel, optimistic, cheerful, witty humor.
sentences.chinese: 博學多才，一表人才，開朗樂觀，風趣幽默。

sentences.english: I am from a well-cultivated family.
sentences.chinese: 我來自一個高知家庭，自小自信，樂觀。

sentences.english: Optimists love to talk their way through.
sentences.chinese: 樂觀者就喜歡用他們的“快嘴”斬亂麻。

sentences.english: It is because of this kind of optimistic, not afraid difficulty mentality.
sentences.chinese: 正是由於這種樂觀積極，不懼困難的心態。

sentences.english: Herzog and Simons are optimistic about the prospects for making progress against migraines.
sentences.chinese: 荷佐和賽門斯對於治療偏頭痛的未來進展頗爲樂觀。

sentences.english: Optimists see the flower, while pessimists see the thorns.
sentences.chinese: 樂觀者看見花，而悲觀者看到的刺。

sentences.english: We allowed ourselves to become too optimistic.
sentences.chinese: 我們總是讓我們變得太樂觀。

sentences.english: Never make a move if you are merely optimistic.
sentences.chinese: 如果你只是樂觀而已，千萬不要輕舉妄動。

sentences.english: I believe these are optimistic times for health.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲現在是衛生工作的樂觀時期。

sentences.english: The distortion psychology of viewpoint on hardship and happiness is to refuse to take on the moral obligation to endanger society.
sentences.chinese: 苦樂觀的扭曲心理是拒絕承擔道德責任而危害社會。

sentences.english: Liu Hua is very optimistic about his future.
sentences.chinese: 劉華對他的前途很樂觀。

sentences.english: However, forecasts for second-quarter earnings remain supportive and valuations have become much more attractive.
sentences.chinese: 不過，第二季盈利預測依然樂觀，股值亦更爲吸引。

sentences.english: Can we be more legitimately optimistic about design?
sentences.chinese: 對於設計，我們能夠更合理的更樂觀的麼？

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
to approve of/to endorse/to acknowledge/to recognize/to identify oneself with
